document_data.name: Finder
document_data.mainbody: '''Finders''' were [[specialty priest]]s devoted to [[Finder Wyvernspur]], the Nameless Bard.
document_data.Abilities: Finders could cast the following [[spell]]s once per dayâ€”''[[charm person]]'', ''[[find the path]]'', ''[[Melisander's harp]]'', and ''[[starharp]]''. ''[[Ghost pipes]]'', ''[[dispel silence]]'', and ''[[slow rot]]'' could be cast twice per day.
document_data.Possessions: Finders could train with any weapon but the heaviest [[armor]] they could wear was [[chainmail]]. They never carried a [[shield]].
